00023 #ifndef LINE_H
00024 #define LINE_H
00025 
00026 #include <gtl/gtl.hpp>
00027 #include <gtl/vec2.hpp>
00028 #include <gtl/curve.hpp>
00029 
00030 namespace gtl
00031 {
00037         template<typename Type>
00038         class Line : public Curve<Type>
00039         {
00040         public:
00042                 Line()
00043                 {
00044                         Vec2<Type> pts[2];
00045 
00046                         pts[0].x() = (Type)0.0;
00047                         pts[0].y() = (Type)0.0;
00048                         pts[1].x() = (Type)1.0;
00049                         pts[1].y() = (Type)1.0;
00050 
00051                         m_initial_points[0] = pts[0];
00052                         m_initial_points[1] = pts[1];
00053 
00054                         Curve<Type>::setPoints(pts, 2);
00055                 }
00056 
00058                 Line(Vec2<Type> &start_pt, Vec2<Type> &end_pt)
00059                 {
00060                         if (setPoints(start_pt, end_pt) < 0)
00061                                 Line(); // if setPoints fails, construct default line...
00062                 }
00063 
00065                 int setPoints(Vec2<Type> &start_pt, Vec2<Type> &end_pt)
00066                 {
00067                         Vec2<Type> pts[2];
00068 
00069                         pts[0] = start_pt;
00070                         pts[1] = end_pt;
00071 
00072                         if (Curve<Type>::setPoints(pts, 2))
00073                         {
00074                                 m_initial_points[0] = pts[0];
00075                                 m_initial_points[1] = pts[1];
00076 
00077                                 return 0;
00078                         } else {
00079                                 return -1;      
00080                         }
00081                 }
00082 
00084                 Type getDistance(Vec2<Type> point)
00085                 {
00086                         Type y, m, x, b;        // variables of the line equation
00087                         Type distance;
00088 
00089                         y = m_initial_points[0].y();
00090                         x = m_initial_points[0].x();
00091                         getEquation(m_initial_points[0], m_initial_points[1], m, b);
00092 
00093                         distance = (Type)(fabs( ((double)m * (double)point.x()) - point.y() + b ) / (double) sqrt( SQR(m) + 1.0 ));
00094 
00095                         return distance;
00096                 }
00097 
00099                 static void getEquation(Vec2<Type> &pt1, Vec2<Type> &pt2, Type &m, Type &b)
00100                 {
00101                         m = (Type)((double)(pt1.y() - pt2.y()) / (double)(pt1.x() - pt2.x()));
00102                         b = pt1.y() - (m * pt1.x());
00103                 }
00104 
00105         protected:
00106                 Vec2<Type>      m_initial_points[2];    // the 2 initial points from which this line was declared
00107 };
00108 
00109 typedef Line<int>    Linei;
00110 typedef Line<float>  Linef;
00111 typedef Line<double> Lined;
00112 } // namespace gtl
00113 
00114 #endif
